message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I'm open to discussing this further if you have any thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe it's a bit higher than what I'm willing to pay.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective on the price, the value this product brings is significant.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $925,000. I'm confident this would be a fair deal for both of us.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $925,000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $900,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings.
